DataElement.preferredName: Miniscrew Temporary Anchorage Device Patient Anxiety Placement Category
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A small screw of between 6-14mm in length placed between the roots of a tooth for purposes of anchoring the tooth during orthodonic treatment._Apprehension of danger and dread accompanied by restlessness, tension, tachycardia, and dyspnea unattached to a clearly identifiable stimulus._Position or arrangement, as of the teeth; the state of being placed or arranged, as the assignment of a person to a appropriate clinical study._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.
